title: Home Assistant metrics
description: Used to show data from a Home Assistant installation
name: hametrics

title: Ivideon Server
description: A cloud-based video surveillance solution for business and the home
name: ivideon-server
note: Choose bridge network to access Ivideon Cloud and to be container accessible from the outside for the Ivideon Client local view.

env.name: SERVER_NAME
env.label: Server name
env.description: Ivideon server name without spaces (displayed in Ivideon Client and Web UI)

env.name: PUID
env.label: UID
env.description: Specifies the UID for the container internal transmission user (used for process and file ownership)

env.name: PGID
env.label: GID
env.description: Specifies the GID for the container internal transmission group (used for file ownership)

title: UniFi Controller
name: unifi
note: Choose right network (macvlan preferred). This container must be exposed to the outside. Bridge network does not work properly.

env.name: PUID
env.label: UID
env.description: Specifies the UID for the container internal unifi user (used for process and file ownership)

env.name: PGID
env.label: GID
env.description: Specifies the GID for the container internal unifi group (used for file ownership)

title: Zabbix Agent
name: zabbix-agent
note: Choose right network (bridge preferred). This container port must be exposed for server to connect to it.

env.name: ZBX_HOSTNAME
env.label: Zabbix Agent hostname
env.description: ZBX_HOSTNAME - This variable is unique, case sensitive hostname.

env.name: ZBX_SERVER_HOST
env.label: Zabbix Server host
env.description: ZBX_SERVER_HOST - This variable is IP or DNS name of Zabbix server or Zabbix proxy.

title: Zabbix Proxy
name: zabbix-proxy
note: Choose right network (bridge preferred). This container port must be exposed for agents to connect to it.

env.name: ZBX_PROXYMODE
env.label: Zabbix Proxy mode
env.description: ZBX_PROXYMODE - The variable allows to switch Zabbix proxy mode. Bu default, value is 0 - active proxy. Allowed values are 0 - active proxy and 1 - passive proxy.

env.name: ZBX_HOSTNAME
env.label: Zabbix Proxy hostname
env.description: ZBX_HOSTNAME - This variable is unique, case sensitive hostname.

env.name: ZBX_SERVER_HOST
env.label: Zabbix Server host
env.description: ZBX_SERVER_HOST - This variable is IP or DNS name of Zabbix server or Zabbix proxy.

env.name: ZBX_SERVER_PORT
env.label: Zabbix Server port
env.description: ZBX_SERVER_PORT - This variable is port Zabbix server listening on.
